param.name: DBH
param.title: Diameter at Breast Height measured at 1.4 m above ground.

param.name: Ring radius/year
param.title: Ring radius increase per annum :see the table under About for suggested values for different species

param.name: Age at Maturity
param.title: Age at Maturity - the end of core growth :see the table under About for suggested values for different species

param.name: Lifespan
param.title: Expected lifespan of tree - see About for suggested values

param.name: Canopy %
param.title: Tree Canopy damage is often present in established trees and diminishes the tree biomass

param.name: DBH->Biomass:A
param.title: the A cooefficient in the relation of the tree biomass to its diameter: ln(biomass) = A + B ln(DBH) see About for typical values

param.name: DBH->Biomass:B
param.title: the B cooefficient in the DBH to Biomass relation

param.name: Decay years
param.title: Years to decay : 1 indicates that the tree is chipped and burnt; higher figures allow the tree to rot; 0 means that the tree timber is retained and used.

param.name: No of Replacements
param.title: If BTRS is selected, this will be determined by that standard.

param.name: Age at Planting
param.title: Typically this is tree of about 6 years old

param.name: Planting delay
param.title: Replacement tree is typically planted in the next session

param.name: Establishment years
param.title: Newly planted trees take a couple of years to establish the root system before putting on above ground growth.

param.name: DBH->Biomass:A
param.title: The A cooefficient in the relation of the tree biomass to its diameter: ln(biomass) = A + B ln(DBH) see About for typical values

param.name: DBH->Biomass:B
param.title: the B cooeficient in the DBH to Biomass relation
